languages.text: {n}Хотя скорбная маска Арлекина абсолютно неподвижна, вы не можете стряхнуть ощущение, что за ней прячется недобрая усмешка. Это игра, проверка. Нужно осторожно подбирать слова.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Хотя скорбная маска Арлекина абсолютно неподвижна, вы не можете стряхнуть ощущение, что за ней прячется недобрая усмешка. Это игра, проверка. Нужно осторожно подбирать слова.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text: {n}Although the Harlequin's mournful mask is absolutely still, you cannot shake the feeling that a nasty grin lurks behind it. This is a game, a test. You must choose your words carefully.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хотя скорбная маска Арлекина абсолютно неподвижна, вы не можете стряхнуть ощущение, что за ней прячется недобрая усмешка. Это игра, проверка. Нужно осторожно подбирать слова.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Although the Harlequin's mournful mask is absolutely still, you cannot shake the feeling that a nasty grin lurks behind it. This is a game, a test. You must choose your words carefully.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

traits.locale_text: {n}Although the Harlequin's mournful mask is absolutely still, you cannot shake the feeling that a nasty grin lurks behind it. This is a game, a test. You must choose your words carefully.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

traits.locale_text: {n}Although the Harlequin's mournful mask is absolutely still, you cannot shake the feeling that a nasty grin lurks behind it. This is a game, a test. You must choose your words carefully.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

traits.locale_text: {n}Although the Harlequin's mournful mask is absolutely still, you cannot shake the feeling that a nasty grin lurks behind it. This is a game, a test. You must choose your words carefully.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text: {n}尽管丑角脸上哀伤的面具没有任何表情，但你总感觉面具背后掩藏着一个令人讨厌的笑脸。这是一场游戏，一场测试，你必须谨慎选择你的措辞。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Although the Harlequin's mournful mask is absolutely still, you cannot shake the feeling that a nasty grin lurks behind it. This is a game, a test. You must choose your words carefully.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管丑角脸上哀伤的面具没有任何表情，但你总感觉面具背后掩藏着一个令人讨厌的笑脸。这是一场游戏，一场测试，你必须谨慎选择你的措辞。{/n}
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text: {n}A pesar de que la máscara apenada del Arlequín está perfectamente inmóvil, no puedes evitar sentir que oculta una sonrisa cruel. Esto es un juego, una prueba. Debes elegir tus palabras con sumo cuidado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Although the Harlequin's mournful mask is absolutely still, you cannot shake the feeling that a nasty grin lurks behind it. This is a game, a test. You must choose your words carefully.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A pesar de que la máscara apenada del Arlequín está perfectamente inmóvil, no puedes evitar sentir que oculta una sonrisa cruel. Esto es un juego, una prueba. Debes elegir tus palabras con sumo cuidado.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text: {n}ハーレクィンの哀愁を帯びた仮面はまったく動かないが、その裏には意地の悪い笑みが潜んでいるような気がしてならない。これはゲームであり、試練だ。慎重に言葉を選ばなければならない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Although the Harlequin's mournful mask is absolutely still, you cannot shake the feeling that a nasty grin lurks behind it. This is a game, a test. You must choose your words carefully.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハーレクィンの哀愁を帯びた仮面はまったく動かないが、その裏には意地の悪い笑みが潜んでいるような気がしてならない。これはゲームであり、試練だ。慎重に言葉を選ばなければならない。{/n}
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text: {n}Obwohl die traurige Maske des Harlekins absolut reglos ist, wirst du das Gefühl nicht los, dass dahinter ein böses Grinsen lauert. Das ist ein Spiel, eine Prüfung. Du musst deine Worte sorgfältig wählen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Although the Harlequin's mournful mask is absolutely still, you cannot shake the feeling that a nasty grin lurks behind it. This is a game, a test. You must choose your words carefully.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Obwohl die traurige Maske des Harlekins absolut reglos ist, wirst du das Gefühl nicht los, dass dahinter ein böses Grinsen lauert. Das ist ein Spiel, eine Prüfung. Du musst deine Worte sorgfältig wählen.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text: {n}Bien que le masque chagriné de l'Arlequin soit parfaitement immobile, vous avez l'intime conviction qu'il dissimule un sourire cruel. C'est un jeu, une épreuve ; vous devez choisir vos mots avec le plus grand soin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Although the Harlequin's mournful mask is absolutely still, you cannot shake the feeling that a nasty grin lurks behind it. This is a game, a test. You must choose your words carefully.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bien que le masque chagriné de l'arlequin soit parfaitement immobile, vous avez l'intime conviction qu'il dissimule un sourire cruel. C'est un jeu, une épreuve ; vous devez choisir vos mots avec le plus grand soin.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text: {n}Arleken'in kederli maskesi asla hareket etmese de maskenin ardından pis pis sırıttığına adın gibi eminsin. Bu bir oyun. Bu bir sınav. Diyeceklerini dikkatlice seçmelisin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Although the Harlequin's mournful mask is absolutely still, you cannot shake the feeling that a nasty grin lurks behind it. This is a game, a test. You must choose your words carefully.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Arleken'in kederli maskesi asla hareket etmese de, maskenin ardından pis pis sırıttığına adın gibi eminsin. Bu bir oyun. Bu bir test. Diyeceklerini dikkatlice seçmen lazım.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle
